DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect interactive ICT-platform use smartphone tablet patient treat radiotherapy prostate cancer . The hypothesis clinical management improved cost reduce safe participatory care promote , patient report symptom application provide self-care advice instant access professional .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Interactive ICT-Platform Assessment Management Symptoms Patients Treated Prostate Cancer
